key.name: im-enabled
key.description: Whether to enable transparency of IM windows.

key.name: im-alpha
key.description: The opacity applied to an IM window.

key.name: im-slider
key.summary: Show slider bar in IM windows
key.description: Shows a slider bar in IM windows with which the transparency level may be modified.

key.name: im-solid-onfocus
key.summary: Remove IM window transparency on focus
key.description: Whether to make an IM window opaque whenever it has focus.

key.name: bl-enabled
key.description: Whether to enable transparency of the Buddy List window.

key.name: bl-alpha
key.description: The opacity applied to the Buddy List window.

key.name: bl-solid-onfocus
key.summary: Remove Buddy List window transparency on focus
key.description: Whether to make the Buddy List window opaque whenever it has focus.
